item.title: About the Surveyor
item.description: The LASA Surveyor is a club that surveys the student body every few weeks and publishes interesting data breakdowns on our website. Member Contact Mr. Word (Sponsor) thomas.word@austinisd.org Naman Mishra (President) naman@lasasurveyor.com Rachit Kakkar (Officer) rachit@lasasurveyor.com Max Bentley (Officer) max@lasasurveyor.com Mikah Muhaisen (Officer) mikah@lasasurveyor.com It also breaks down the data into formats designed for social media, such as graphics and short videos, and posts them on its Instagram. The club allows students to practice skills like data analysis, social media outreach, writing, and website management.
